errors.error_description: The `gftools compare-font` command example is missing the second font file argument required for comparison, which will cause the command to fail.
The required Python version is not specified, only stating 'a recent version,' which is ambiguous and can lead to installation or runtime issues if an incompatible version is used.
correction_candidates: Please note that gftools requires Python 3.
Please note that gftools is compatible with Python 2.7 and 3.x.
Please note that gftools requires Python 3.6 or later.
Please note that gftools requires [Python 3.7](http://www.python.org/download/) or later.
errors.golden_answer: Please note that gftools requires [Python 3.7](http://www.python.org/download/) or later.
